Text: What on earth is this shit? Does the author live in the middle ages? Honestly this is ridiculous.
I'm gonna spread this one amongst the guys at work, a true sucsess, for sure.....  :-)
Hmm... I wonder what a typical feminist reaction to a book entitled "The Proper Care and Feeding of Wives" would be?
Awesome, thanks! Am going to put this on my wife's iPod. About time she straightened up her act. Can't remember the last time she ironed any of my clothes.
LOL Guys! No Doubt! It's good one.

I actually really like this book... not going to say that I agree wiith everything, but as a strong and independant woman.... i will say that I am willing to jump through hoops to help make my husband feel valuable and needed.... when he feels valued I am treated like a QUEEN/Princess etc....it is WELL worth the effort... and if nothing else I have used this as a manual to get through a ROUGH spot to help shape my reactions so we don't argue while keeping myself from being a doormat....

thank you DR> Laura

this torrent is great... thanks fatty gordon
I have been divorced, and if I can help just one person avoid the trauma I have been through, it will be well worth it. I will be seeding this torrent indefinitely.
My share ratio is almost 16, and there is still no significant new seeding going on. People! What is with the hit and run?!
Thanks, gordon.  She's got it right.
